original_text: As she was going to get it, he called, “And bring me, please, a piece of bread.”
korean_text: 그가 가지러 갈 때에 엘리야가 그를 불러 이르되 청하건대 네 손의 떡 한 조각을 내게로 가져오라

sentences.original_text: As she was going to get it
And bring me, please, a piece of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 빵 한 조각을 가져다 주세요
